trans-unit.source: Represents a chain-building engine for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> certificates.
trans-unit.target: 代表的鏈結建置引擎<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>憑證。

trans-unit.source: The X509Chain object has a global error status called <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainStatus%2A> that should be used for certificate validation.
trans-unit.target: X509Chain 物件的全域錯誤狀態會是呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainStatus%2A>應該用憑證驗證。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rules governing certificate validation are complex, and it is easy to oversimplify the validation logic by ignoring the error status of one or more of the elements involved.
trans-unit.target: 控制憑證驗證的規則很複雜，而且很容易忽略錯誤狀態的一或多個相關的項目時，過度的驗證邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The global error status takes into consideration the status of each element in the chain.
trans-unit.target: 全域錯誤狀態會考量每個項目的鏈結中的狀態。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > > For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/add/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the X509Chain class does not implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method.
trans-unit.target: >> 為目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/add/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和舊版中，X509Chain 類別未實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> class specifying a value that indicates whether the machine context should be used.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>類別指定值，指出是否應使用電腦內容。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used when the user profile is not loaded and the machine context needs to be used.
trans-unit.target: 時不會載入使用者設定檔，因此需要使用電腦內容，可以使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: When the `useMachineContext` parameter is set to `true`, the local machine context (HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE flag) is used to create the chain.
trans-unit.target: 當`useMachineContext`參數設定為`true`，本機內容 （HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE 旗標） 用來建立鏈結。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is set to `false`, the current user context (HCCE_CURRENT_USER flag) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此參數設定為`false`，會使用目前的使用者內容 （HCCE_CURRENT_USER 旗標）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the machine context; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use the current user context.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用電腦內容，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示使用目前使用者內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> class using an <xref:System.IntPtr> handle to an X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>類別使用<xref:System.IntPtr>X.509 鏈結的控制代碼。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，以提供與 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 相容性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> handle to an X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>X.509 鏈結的控制代碼。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: The chainContext parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The chainContext parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The chainContext parameter points to an invalid context.
trans-unit.target: chainContext 參數指向無效的內容。

trans-unit.source: Builds an X.509 chain using the policy specified in <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建置 X.509 鏈結，使用指定的原則中<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Note that a valid X.509 certificate from a trusted issuer is valid only for the use specified in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，從受信任的簽發者有效的 X.509 憑證僅適用於使用中指定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Certificates that meet these chain policy rules might still be invalid for specific uses with such features as Security/MIME (SMIME), Authenticode, or Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).
trans-unit.target: 符合這些鏈結原則規則的憑證可能仍然是針對與安全性/MIME (SMIME)、 Authenticode、 或安全通訊端層 (SSL) 等功能的特定用法無效。

trans-unit.source: If further processing is required to determine whether the certificate is valid for a specific policy, derive a class from <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain> and override the Build method so that it calls the base class `Build` method first, and then does the additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如進一步處理才能判斷憑證是否適用於特定的原則，衍生自<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain>並使它呼叫基底類別，覆寫建置方法`Build`方法第一次，，然後執行額外的處理。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the X.509 certificate is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 X.509 憑證有效，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not a valid certificate or is .
trans-unit.target: certificate 不是有效的憑證或 。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: certificate 無法讀取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to an X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: 取得 X.509 鏈結的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to return a handle that is compatible with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性傳回的控制代碼會與未受管理 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 相容。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> handle to an X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>X.509 鏈結的控制代碼。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElement"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElement"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElement> object is a representation of an element in the chain that was built during a call to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElement>物件是表示，在鏈結中，呼叫期間所建立的項目<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElement>

trans-unit.source: A chain element consists of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object, an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus> structure, and an extra information string (available only on Windows XP platforms).
trans-unit.target: 鏈結元素組成<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus>結構，以及額外的資訊字串 （只適用於 Windows XP 平台）。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"></xref> to use when building an X.509 certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"></xref>建置 X.509 憑證鏈結時使用。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set chain policy.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來設定鏈結原則。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the Enhanced Key Usage (EKU) for which the chain should be validated, or specify revocation checking.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定增強金鑰使用方法 (EKU) 的鏈結時，應驗證，或指定撤銷檢查。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"></xref> object associated with this X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"> </xref>這個 X.509 鏈結與相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value being set for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是所設定的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of each element in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得每個項目狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get detailed error information for the status of the chain.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，以取得詳細的錯誤資訊狀態的鏈結。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> object after querying for the mapping defined in the CryptoConfig file, and maps the chain to that mapping.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>物件在 CryptoConfig 檔案中，對應的查詢定義之後，並將鏈結對應至該對應。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method will create an X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會建立 X.509 鏈結。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method when the default chain-building engine is overridden in the Machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: 預設的鏈結建置引擎會覆寫 Machine.config 檔案中時，您也可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that for compatibility, any chain engine must attempt to honor the call and return semantics of the default chain engine.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，為了相容，任何鏈結引擎必須嘗試接受呼叫，而且系統會傳回預設鏈結引擎的語意。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases all of the resources used by this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 釋放所有資源所使用的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放所使用的 unmanaged 的資源<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"> </xref>，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Clears the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 清除目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a safe handle for this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個安全控制代碼<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeX509ChainHandle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeX509ChainHandle"> </xref>。
